thread.section_title: Woman ‘gave boyfriend a blowjob in court then uploaded video of it to Twitter’ – Metro
thread.title: Woman ‘gave boyfriend a blowjob in court then uploaded video of it to Twitter’
thread.title_full: Woman ‘gave boyfriend a blowjob in court then uploaded video of it to Twitter’

author: Tanveer Mann
title: Woman ‘gave boyfriend a blowjob in court then uploaded video of it to Twitter’
text:
Brittney Jones, 26, has been arrested after she allegedly gave her boyfriend a blowjob in court (Picture: Jacksonville Sheriff’s Office) A woman has been accused of giving her boyfriend a blowjob in court and then posting a video of it on Twitter. 
Brittney Jones, 26, was arrested after she was allegedly seen performing oral sex on Jeremiah Isiah Robinson, 35, in a 34-second video clip posted on Twitter.
Woman who vowed to give 19,419,507 blowjobs is coming to the UK In the footage, the woman appears to be in the hallway of the fourth floor of the Duval County Courthouse.
The video was posted to Twitter on January 31 with the caption: ‘Had so much fun at court today. Found a way to get my charges dropped…. h don’t tell.
The woman also wrote: ‘Just found a way to get out of trouble’ and ‘That damn tongue got me in trouble again lol.’
Jeremiah Robinson, 35, was also wanted by authorities on a charge of an unnatural and lascivious act inside the courthouse (Picture: Jacksonville Sheriff’s Office) Jones’ attorney, Jerry Sessions, claims she is not guilty and said the charge was ‘archaic.’
She appeared in court last Thursday and did not enter a plea on the sex charge, but entered not guilty on a contraband charge.
She was given a $10,000 bond on the sex charge but it’s unclear if she’s been bailed yet.
MORE: Two porn stars promise blowjobs to their Twitter followers if New England Patriots win the Super Bowl 
The 26-year-old was arrested when police were called to her home in Jacksonville, Florida on Wednesday (Picture: Jacksonville Sheriff’s Office) Robinson turned himself in last week and entered a not guilty plea on February 7. He is now on bail.
Authorities said the shocking incident occurred during working hours at the court and security cameras recorded the sex act.
Two men caught performing sex act in busy Newcastle shopping centre Jones was at the court facing charges of possession of drug paraphernalia, smuggling contraband into jail and violation of probation.
The 26-year-old was arrested when police were called to her home in Jacksonville, Florida, to aid a bail bonds worker in serving a warrant for her arrest, according to the Florida Times-Union.
She was then taken to Duval County jail on Wednesday.
Officers began investigating Jones after the video from inside a public area of the courthouse was posted on Twitter last month. (Picture: News4Jax) Officers began investigating Jones after the video from inside a public area of the courthouse was posted on Twitter last month.
The video has since been deleted by Jones, who recently wrote that she and her boyfriend had broken up.
Chip shop owner ‘offered children drugs to do sex act with jumbo sausage’ According to court records, Jones didn’t contest the charges and was sentenced to time served and fined after spending two days in prison in relation to those charges.
Her father David told News4Jax that he was disappointed at his daughter’s actions but said it wasn’t the first time she had posted sexually explicit content online and the family had been trying to get to stop for years.
Jones’ grandmother said the 26-year-old had a son.
She said: ‘I would hate for him to turn on TV and see his mom. That’s very very upsetting to me.’
